page.title: 18SCORAIG FESTIVALS
page.content: ON SCORAIG THERE HAVE BEEN 2 FESTIVALS.AT THE FIRST THERE WERE 250 PEOPLE. AT THE SECOND THERE WERE ABOUT 500.ALL THE PROFITS WENT TO C.N.D. BUT EVERYTHING IS FREE AND THE ORGANISERS JUST RELY ON DONATIONS. PEOPLE WERE STATIONED AT THE BADLUARACH SIDE TO WATCH THE TRAFFIC.VISITORS WERE FERRIED BY FISHING BOAT ACROSS THE LOCH. THERE WERE ABOUT 4 ACRES OF FESTIVAL GROUND AND 3 ACRES OF CAMPING GROUND.SOME PEOPLE STAYED IN A TEEPEE. FOOD WAS BOUGHT IN AND GIVEN OUT AT A FOOD TENT.THERE WERE 3 MEALS A DAY. WATER WAS STORED IN 750 GALLON DRUMS. FOR DRINK THERE WAS BEER,TEA,COFFEE AND APPLE JUICE. FOR ENTERTAINMENT THERE WAS JUGGLING,MUSIC,FOLK DANCING AND DANCING.
